StatusEffect.showmessage: Who is our true enemy? For years, the coalition has been using its power to maintain its autocratic regime. It never acts as its propagandas say. In years 2037, just after two months before contact was lost with the Earth, the Coalition starts to take over the Europa in a swiping force. It brutally murders people who don't have different opinions. It imprisons citizens who knows the secrets that can harm the Coalition. We must wake up! For now we...
